description: a(n) = 1 if n is squarefree, otherwise 2.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
mathematica: f[n_]:=Union[Last/@FactorInteger[n]][[ -1]];lst={1};Do[If[f[n]==1,AppendTo[lst,1],AppendTo[lst,2]],{n,2,6!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Mar 07 2010 *)Table[If[SquareFreeQ[n],1,2],{n,100}] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 09 2014 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
